title: Kate Green – 2021 Comments on Resignation of Kevan Collins
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kate Green, the Shadow Education Secretary, on 2 June 2021.
content:
Kevan Collins’ resignation is a damning indictment of the Conservatives’ education catch-up plan.
